Class SpatialDataMapper

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.engine.spatial.SpatialDataMapper
public final class SpatialDataMapper extends Object
Zero-allocation mapper for streaming model data into spatial buffers.

Platform-independent and headless-certified. No AWT/Swing dependencies.

Since:
1.7.0
Version:
1.7.0
Author:
Arber Gashi

      public int getCalculatedPointCount(ChartModel model)
      Calculates the logical point count that can be mapped from the model.

    • getCalculatedChunkCount

      public int getCalculatedChunkCount(ChartModel model, SpatialBuffer buffer)
      Calculates the number of chunks required to map the model into the buffer capacity.

    • mapToSpatialBuffer

      public int mapToSpatialBuffer(ChartModel model, int startIndex, int pointCount, SpatialBuffer buffer)
      Maps a range of model points into the spatial buffer input coordinates.

      Output is packed as xyz triples.

      Parameters:
      model - source model
      startIndex - first point index
      pointCount - number of points to map
      buffer - destination spatial buffer
      Returns:
      number of points written

    • mapToSpatialBuffer

      public int mapToSpatialBuffer(ChartModel model, int startIndex, int pointCount, SpatialBuffer buffer, CoordinateTransformer transformer, PlotContext context)
      Maps a range of model points into the spatial buffer using a coordinate transformer.

      Output is packed as xyz triples.

      Parameters:
      model - source model
      startIndex - first point index
      pointCount - number of points to map
      buffer - destination spatial buffer
      transformer - coordinate transformer (may be null)
      context - plot context for the transformer (may be null)
      Returns:
      number of points written

    • mapAll

      public void mapAll(ChartModel model, SpatialBuffer buffer, SpatialChunkConsumer consumer)
      Streams the entire model into the spatial buffer in fixed-size chunks.
      Parameters:
      model - source model
      buffer - destination buffer
      consumer - consumer invoked for each filled chunk

    • mapAll

      public void mapAll(ChartModel model, SpatialBuffer buffer, CoordinateTransformer transformer, PlotContext context, SpatialChunkConsumer consumer)
      Streams the entire model into the spatial buffer using a coordinate transformer.
      Parameters:
      model - source model
      buffer - destination buffer
      transformer - coordinate transformer (may be null)
      context - plot context for the transformer (may be null)
      consumer - consumer invoked for each filled chunk

    • mapAllProjected

      public void mapAllProjected(ChartModel model, SpatialBuffer buffer, Matrix4x4 transform, SpatialProjector projector, SpatialChunkConsumer consumer)
      Streams the model through an optional transform and projector chain.

      Flow: model -> buffer input -> matrix transform (optional) -> projector (optional) -> buffer output.

      Parameters:
      model - source model
      buffer - spatial buffer
      transform - optional transform (may be null)
      projector - optional projector (may be null)
      consumer - consumer invoked after each processed chunk

    • mapAllProjected

      public void mapAllProjected(ChartModel model, SpatialBuffer buffer, Matrix4x4 transform, SpatialProjector projector, CoordinateTransformer transformer, PlotContext context, SpatialChunkConsumer consumer)
      Streams the model through an optional transform and projector chain using a coordinate transformer.

      Flow: model -> buffer input -> coordinate transform (optional) -> matrix transform (optional) -> projector (optional) -> buffer output.

      Parameters:
      model - source model
      buffer - spatial buffer
      transform - optional transform (may be null)
      projector - optional projector (may be null)
      transformer - coordinate transformer (may be null)
      context - plot context for the transformer (may be null)
      consumer - consumer invoked after each processed chunk

    • mapRingDeltaProjected

      public void mapRingDeltaProjected(SpatialBuffer buffer, Matrix4x4 transform, SpatialProjector projector, SpatialChunkConsumer consumer)
      Streams only the newly written ring-buffer points through the spatial pipeline.

      Uses the ring delta cursor maintained by SpatialBuffer.

      Parameters:
      buffer - spatial ring buffer
      transform - optional transform
      projector - optional projector
      consumer - chunk consumer
